name: Colour Bind
description: Colour Bind is a physics platform-puzzler set in an abstract world where gravity is determined not by mass, but by colour.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP Processor: 1.4GHz or faster Memory: 768 MB RAM Graphics: Pixel Shader 2.0 (some older integrated cards might not work) DirectX®: 9.0c Hard Drive: 50 MB HD space

reviews.review_text: I normally like puzzle games, but this was just too annoying....
Im colorblind, so Im totally recommending this.
